attributes.comment:
As a citizen looking into study outside of the US, I find it appaling to think that my
chances of regaining my citizenship, will be even more difficult than it already is.
With a price hike of the new bill, not only will I face a six month wait, but now with
the increase of detering foreigners by money, I have more of a challenge than is
absolutely necessary. America, is and always shall be my home, my place of
birth, and in my heart, but. We cannot better ourselves or the world by simply
asking for more money to "come here". We want a better economy, but yet we
tell our potential outside the border buisiness that if you really want it well... I
understand the concept; the overpopulation fear. The Risks involved in just letting
any old fool into our borders, but what stops the rest of the world from simply
uniting and boycotting America. When the globe finally gets sick of the second
rate treatment, all every country has to do is simply "hold out" for a generation
and we will really be in a shithole. But thats imagination; Potential. Possible. Not
real, or happening. But, that is the exact same bassis that this increase is based
upon. Imagination. Oh what do I know? I'm just an american.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
